body: WELCOME BACK TA BO'OM GEAR MATES
bruh idk this named 'Top Gear' until I saw bunch of comments referencing Top Gear jokes.
poor dude think he can get away with blackmailing(it's a crime), double-standard and possibility of false accusation.
Geez!!!
Where's the cars?

@menscultureunion That's the point as "Omurice" put it, neither of them are good! But he's the stupid one who put himself in this position as her cock slave cause he was hoping to do that shit to her and lost! Story made it clear she's not good, and she's not going to risk her reputation being ruined even though as she said, it would have been quieted down and she can easily transfer! The story was more or less showing what happens when someone small goes up against someone BIG without the right weapons! They get destroyed easily! Damaging his reputation would also hurt her's, but he doesn't know (or for her NEEDS TO KNOW THAT!)
@Reyas : I'm agree with ya. Usually blackmail shit always lead to NTR because the girl is dumb. But this is refreshing

This was the one I was looking for. Finally a female character that handles the "I HAVE PIKSHURE!!" blackmail the way we're all thinking. Instead of going along with it, just say no and hit right back. Like she said, who are they going to believe a respected teacher or some asshole delinquent? ha. Yeah I despise cunts that falsely accuse men of rape but I'll let it slide when it's against a guy that threatened her with life-destroying pictures to force her into sex.  Well played, well deserved.
yooo makima vibes
I don’t usually like these kind of blackmail stories but they’re both asshole so fuck em.

bottom gear also gross. I have to commend her for the reverse blackmail, but threatening to put rape on his record is way too far. That's stuff that would ruin your life. If she was going to threaten him, she should just do a smaller one that doesn't outcast him from society forever, like just giving him the knee and taking away the photos. Also femdom can be cool, but in the same way non-femdom can be. It all depends on how they treat the other. If the woman's wearing the pants, cool. If she practically rapes him and forces him to be a sex slave, not cool.
On tonight’s top gear Jeremy takes photos of his teacher masturbating, Hammond gets kneed in the face, and I become a slave to my teacher.
